summary: NASA, or the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, is a U.S. government agency that explores space and conducts scientific research. It was founded in 1958 to lead America's peaceful space missions. NASA has sent astronauts to the Moon, launched space shuttles, and built the International Space Station. They also study Earth, the Sun, and other planets using telescopes and robotic spacecraft. Currently, NASA is working on the Artemis program, aiming to return humans to the Moon.
title: NASA
